#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define in(t) scanf("%lld",&t)
#define rep(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)

int main()
{
	ll t,i,j,n,k;
	in(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		in(n);
		int *a = new int[n];
		rep(i,n)
		{
			in(j);
			a[i]=j;
		}
		sort(a,a+n);
		(n&1)?k=(n/2)+1:k=n/2;
		int *b = new int[n];
		for(i=0,j=0;j<n;i++,j=j+2)
		{
			b[j]=a[i];
		}
		for(j=1,i=k;j<n&&i<n;i++,j=j+2)
		{
			b[j]=a[i];
		}
		rep(i,n)
		{
			cout<<b[i]<<" ";
		}
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
